text: Martin Chalfie is a biochemist from the United States. In 2008, he shared the Nobel Prize in Chemistry along with Osamu Shimomura and Roger Y. Tsien "for the discovery and development of the green fluorescent protein, GFP".Website of the Nobel Prize committee. ==References== Category:Nobel Prize in Chemistry winners Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:American biochemists
title: Martin Chalfie
